fr.escape.game.entity

Interface Moveable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Bonus, Boss, Entity, Ship, Shot
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBonus, AbstractBoss, AbstractShip, AbstractShot, BlackHoleShot, EarthShot, FireBallShot, JupiterShot, MissileShot, MoonShot, ShiboleetShot

    public interface Moveable

    An interface for Moveable Entity.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void moveBy(float[] velocity)
      Apply a velocity to this Entity.
      void moveTo(float x, float y)
      Set the Position of the Entity in X-Axis and Y-Axis.
      void rotateBy(int angle)
      Rotate the Entity with the given angle.
      void setRotation(int angle)
      Set the Rotation of the Entity in degree.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateBy

        void rotateBy(int angle)
        Rotate the Entity with the given angle.
        Parameters:
        angle - Rotate the Entity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the Moveable cannot rotate.

      • moveTo

        void moveTo(float x,
          float y)
        Set the Position of the Entity in X-Axis and Y-Axis.
        Parameters:
        x - X Position on axis.
        y - Y Position on axis.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the Moveable move to a fixed position.

      • moveBy

        void moveBy(float[] velocity)

        Apply a velocity to this Entity.

        Velocity is an array with the given properties:

        velocity[0] : Duration of the movement.
        velocity[1] : Force to apply on X.
        velocity[2] : Force to apply on Y.
        velocity[3] (optional) : Use to detect a looping.

        Parameters:
        velocity -

      • setRotation

        void setRotation(int angle)
        Set the Rotation of the Entity in degree.
        Parameters:
        angle - Angle in Degree.
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - If the Moveable cannot rotate.
